item.title: Asset Allocation and Portfolio Performance
item.description: Yearly Performance I benchmark myself against VT (global benchmark) as my portfolio is globally diversified across regions. Since a couple of years ago, I’ve been ‘hugging’ the global benchmark tighly. And I only overweight or underweight certain regions/ countries based on my analysis, watchlists and auto-generated signals. This aligns with my core belief that one should place their bets as widely as possible. Diversification is the only free lunch in the world and I ain’t gonna leave it on the table.
